channel.title: Posts on The Boring Blogger
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Boring Blogger

item.title: Drink More....Water that is!
item.description: Do you drink enough water? It can be hard to tell sometimes, so read on to see if you’re getting enough.

item.title: Streaming 101 - Part 1
item.description: How to stream services for free or little cost. First up - Old School Cool.

item.title: Neti for your health
item.description: Prevent colds, the flu, and maybe even COVID with a simple nasal rinse.

item.title: You need a break
item.description: At this point we could all use a break. I’ll show some of the best methods you can use to take a pause at work, just for yourself.

item.title: Carpet Stain Solution
item.description: Read on for the how-to for getting just about any stain out of carpet with no harsh chemicals, expensive equipment, or rentals.
